sentences: Jo Burt (born 1956) is an English rock musician and songwriter.
He is possibly known for being the bassist for Black Sabbath during their 1987 tour in support of the album The Eternal Idol.
Burt continues to write music and now lives in Dorset with his wife, Antonia (a soprano).
Burt still performs regularly in the UK, Europe and North America with his band, The Jo Burt Experience.
